sourcesContent:
<template>
    <input
        type="text"
        :class="['md-input-text md-component', { 'md-filled': isInputFilled }]"
        :value="inputValue"
    />
</template>

<script lang="ts">
import {computed, defineComponent, PropType} from "vue";

export default defineComponent({
    name: "MdInputText",
    props: {
        inputValue: {
            type: String as PropType<String>,
            default: ""
        }
    },
    setup(props, {emit}) {
        const isInputFilled = computed({
            get: () => props.inputValue !== null && props.inputValue.toString().length > 0,
            set: (value) => emit('update:inputValue', value)
        });

        return {isInputFilled};
    }
});
</script>

<style lang="scss">
.md-input-text {
    margin: 0;
    @apply w-full px-5 py-1 text-gray-700 bg-gray-300 rounded focus:outline-none focus:bg-white;
}

.md-fluid {
    .md-input-text {
        @apply w-full;
    }
}

/* InputGroup */
.md-input-group {
    display: flex;
    align-items: stretch;
    width: 100%;
}

.md-input-group-addon {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
}

.md-input-group .md-float-label {
    display: flex;
    align-items: stretch;
    width: 100%;
}

.md-input-group .md-input-text,
.md-fluid .md-input-group .md-input-text,
.md-input-group .md-inputwrapper,
.md-fluid .md-input-group .md-input {
    flex: 1 1 auto;
    width: 1%;
}

/* Floating Label */
.md-float-label {
    display: block;
    position: relative;
}

.md-float-label label {
    position: absolute;
    pointer-events: none;
    top: 50%;
    margin-top: -.5rem;
    transition-property: all;
    transition-timing-function: ease;
    line-height: 1;
}

.md-float-label textarea ~ label {
    top: 1rem;
}

.md-float-label input:focus ~ label,
.md-float-label input.md-filled ~ label,
.md-float-label textarea:focus ~ label,
.md-float-label textarea.md-filled ~ label,
.md-float-label .md-inputwrapper-focus ~ label,
.md-float-label .md-inputwrapper-filled ~ label {
    top: -.75rem;
    font-size: 12px;
}

.md-float-label .input:-webkit-autofill ~ label {
    top: -20px;
    font-size: 12px;
}

.md-input-icon-left,
.md-input-icon-right {
    position: relative;
    display: inline-block;
}

.md-input-icon-left > i,
.md-input-icon-right > i {
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    margin-top: -.5rem;
}

.md-fluid .md-input-icon-left,
.md-fluid .md-input-icon-right {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
}

.md-float-label > label {
    left: 0.5rem;
    color: #6c757d;
    transition-duration: 0.2s;
}
</style>
